articles.author: Alexandra York
articles.title: Why The Diary Of A CEO Founder Turned Down A $100M Deal To Build A Podcast Empire - Forbes
articles.description: How 30 Under 30 Europe alumni and The Diary of A CEO host Steven Bartlett is growing his independent podcast empire.
articles.content: Its a Monday morning in March, and Steven Bartlett sits in his studio in Londons hip Shoreditch neighborhood to record the latest episode of his hit podcast The Diary of a CEO. With more than 10 mill… [+9079 chars]
